Name: WorkMachine
Vision: Make it really easy to create MTurk Tasks and get work done quickly.

Q4.Objective: Rapidly Create New HITs and Launch Them on MTurk.

KeyResults.Metric: Launch a New Campaign within 10 Minutes

Q4.Objective: Simple usage for multiple different types of tasks.

KeyResults.Metric: Create Nested Tables to Collect New Data
Create 3 different examples to show people.

Q4.Objective: Make it easy for people to start.

KeyResults.Metric: Publish on Hacker News and get 20 Stars
